thread.title: Jerry Jorgenson
thread.title_full: Cherry Tree Design reviewed by Jerry Jorgenson

author: Jerry Jorgenson
title: Jerry Jorgenson
text: Cherry Tree's packaging and dimensions are excellent. This is my second order and the previous one has lasted many years with no issues. One oddity is that when closing the three panel, the middle screen must be moved independently rather than just having the middle screen be pulled by the outer screen. There are nice stops in the bottom guide so that no adjustment needs to be made when closing.
